body:
Hey guys!

Well, today as I write this, the date is September 28th, 2015. I thought today would be a necessary day to check up on you guys, because this day last year I got interviewed for Junior Moderator and ultimately got accepted. Crazy how time flies and how much changes in that time, eh? Anyway, I was just wondering, what's up? If you guys are relatively new and unaware, I am an ex 7 month Moderator, devoted over 1,000 hours into this server in total, demoted around 6 months ago, left trying to get that position back. Anyway, I have never been better before. I started school about 3 weeks ago, volunteered for the teen council in my community, where we discuss ideas for the community to improve for teenagers to enjoy, started my first ever soccer season, and even scored my first ever GOAL on Saturday at my game! Without Minecraft, I am a lot more social, I am making way more friends, getting a lot more involved in my community, getting my grades up, as well as my fitness. Also, my birthday is just around the corner, October 13th! One burning question I wouldn't be surprised you are probably asking yourself, "are you coming back?" The answer is no. I would be more than happy to, but I know the consequences would be severe. Anyway, enough of me, how are you guys doing? Let me know! Overall, I am doing great! Thanks guys :) <3

Mods: Not trying to make this a self-centered topic, just letting you guys know what's up and genuinely asking how you guys are doing. ;)

title: Checkin' up

Ay, Pete.

I am Cyneric_/Cynderblock/whatever the hell I was called when you left.

Honestly, I'm kinda happy I left MC, too, since my story is completely identical to yours, except with crew instead of soccer. Anyways, wish we could talk, though probs not :(
